cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)
project(ccd)
include(CompilerSettings)

# The user needs to specify the type used for floating point precision.  Let's choose double precision
file(WRITE src/ccd/config.h "#define CCD_DOUBLE")

include_directories(src)
file(GLOB CCD_SRC "src/*.c")
add_library(ccd SHARED ${CCD_SRC})
